description:
'''Russ music''' ({{langx|no|russemusikk}}) is a subgenre of [[electronic dance music]] and a [[Music community|music scene]] which originated from [[Norway]] during the mid-2000s. Drawing inspiration from [[electronic dance music|EDM]], [[hip hop]] and [[techno]]. Russ music is characterized by its fast [[tempo]], [[synthesizers]], notable [[Bass (sound)|bass]] and [[explicit lyrics]], often combined with [[rapping]].

Usually, this type of music are produced on request by Norwegian [[high school]] graduates to [[Promotion (marketing)|promote]] their "russ concept" as a part of the [[Russefeiring|russ celebration]].

Russ music has lately been labeled as a controversial genre as a part of an constantly growing market. [[Record producer]]s are heavily criticized for their use of explicit lyrics, as the distribution of russ music has grown to be an independent [[music industry]] in Norway.
